pullrequest.title: Access the original parsed version of an SDF document with `Element::OriginalVersion`

content.raw:
> Another option could be to not permit reading into an SDF DOM object that’s already been read into?

I'm not sure I'd call `sdf::SDF` a DOM object. It's a type lower in the abstraction hierarchy used before DOM objects are created. It is also used directly in Gazebo classic to read in sdf files. Not permitting reuse could potentially require significant changes in Gazebo.
content.html:
Another option could be to not permit reading into an SDF DOM object that’s already been read into?

I'm not sure I'd call sdf::SDF a DOM object. It's a type lower in the abstraction hierarchy used before DOM objects are created. It is also used directly in Gazebo classic to read in sdf files. Not permitting reuse could potentially require significant changes in Gazebo.
